item.title: Profile-guided code search
item.description: If you found a typo or a misspelling, please [file an issue](https://github.com/quasilyte/blog-src/issues/new) or send a PR that fixes it. Original (ru): https://habr.com/ru/post/596755/. If you combine a structural code search of gogrep and CPU profile filtering with perf-heatmap, you’ll get a profile-guided code search. This combo lets you find complex code patterns that occur only on the “hot” code path, so optimizing them can be worthwhile. perf-heatmap can also be used by a text editor to display the source code lines performance heat levels as shown below.
